name: photo-of-the-day-sky-iris
title: Photo Of The Day: Sky Iris
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
Sometimes we have to show some love to the tourists in this section, especially when their photos are as creative as this one from Ignatius244. In case you don’t recognize it, this ominous-looking eye in the sky is the dome from inside the Opryland Hotel. We also like his Escher-ish version of the same photo, found over here.
